reviews.title: Total win cargo with great pockets!
reviews.review_text: This cargo pants fits on my husband and he's wearing M ; 165 lbs and 5'10 and he said this perfect fit on him. He said perfect comfort and style. He likes the color and fabric buttery soft! It super flexible and not heavy or hot. Hecan wear all day without feeling stuffy. Also, he likes the pockets and enough to put everything like car keys, phone and even AirPod. Total win!

reviews.title: Super Comfortable Sweat Pants Size Large
reviews.review_text: These dark colored charcoal heather Reebok sweat pants looked great on my 5ft 11 tall husband and they fitted well. The tapered legs are a flattering cut. They are very comfortable to wear and they have handy pockets. My husband is wearing a size Large and they fitted true to size. They are made well and are easy to team up with other sporty Reebok products snd T shirts.

reviews.title: Great pair of joggers for a tall guy
reviews.review_text: I purchased these cargo joggers for my husband who is 6‘3“ tall and normally takes a size medium or 32 inch waist pants. These joggers fit true to size. He is tall and says that these joggers have a very good length they're not too baggy, they're roomy in the waist, but it has adequate elastic as well as as a drawstring. He likes the cargo pockets on the side, which are very large as well as side pockets in the front. There are no pockets in the back, but that was fine. The material is stretchy. It's not super thick, but it feels warm. Overall, he is very satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.title: Very soft and comfy. Great pockets.
reviews.review_text: I am 5'11” and 240 pounds wearing a size XL. This is my typical size with a 36-38 inch waist. These are very warm and comfortable. They are medium weight. I love the cargo pocket details. These are great to wear at home or running errands. Even for outdoor sports in the winter. The quality is really nice and they will definitely keep me warm and cozy. Great gift for dad or grandpa.

reviews.title: Nice fitting cargo style men's sweatpants
reviews.review_text: I purchased these Reebok cargo style sweatpants for my husband. My husband is 5 feet 8 inches and approximately 152 pounds. He typically wears a size medium so I bought these in the size medium. The sizing fit him perfectly. He liked the bottom that was tapered so they didn't hang underneath his feet. The cargo pockets on the side add a nice style to the sweatpants.

reviews.title: Comfortable cargo pants, fits great
reviews.review_text: My husband is 5 foot 9 inches tall, weighs approximately 195 lbs, and tried on the size large in these unwind cargo pants from Reebok. He really likes the relaxed fit, and also the length of the pants. We would say they fit true to size. They are super comfortable and I could definitely see him lounging in these for quite some time! He also loves the pockets. The charcoal Heather color is really nice too.

reviews.title: Men's Reebok Cargo Active Pants
reviews.review_text: Bought these Reebok men's cargo pants for my husband, and they definitely run large. He's usually a medium, but the medium fit more like a roomy large-he probably needed a small. The color is actually quite nice, but that's where the compliments end. For the price, they don't feel worth it. The material is thick and the cut is bulky, which made them look a bit clunky and not very stylish. He said they felt more like utility wear than something he'd want to wear casually. Maybe they'd work better in colder weather, but overall, he wasn't impressed and would rather try a different pair.

reviews.title: Comfortable cargo sweatpants
reviews.review_text: My husband has a 34 inch waist and 30 inch length in his legs and the medium pair of these Reebok unwind cargo sweatpants fit him perfectly. He likes the elastic drawstring waist as well as the fact that they have pockets for his hands. He initially thought they would be too hot but he did not feel that way once he put them on. He really liked the charcoal color as it goes with anything.

reviews.title: Men's Reebok cargo sweatpants
reviews.review_text: My husband is 6'1” and 180lbs so we chose a size Large in these sweatpants and they fit perfectly. He liked the dark gray color on these but wasn't so sure about the side cargo pockets until he realized they are functional pockets. There is a drawstring at the waist for ease of wearing. The material is really nice and lined inside so they would be nice on a cooler day

reviews.title: Comfortable cargo pants for men, runs small
reviews.review_text: These pants fit pretty well on my husband. We bought a size large which is his typical size in sweatpants. He said that the fit and fabric were nice, but he did not like the overall style. The pants were a little too tapered at the bottom of his legs, and they were a little bit low in the waist. I did like the light tan color and the side pockets, but we will not be keeping these due to the fit.

reviews.title: Great fit
reviews.review_text: My son loves it. I was finding it difficult to get the right size of pants for him, then I decided to go with Men's small size and ot worked! Comfy, looks good and he wants more pairs like it. We have a winner.

reviews.title: The end of an era.
reviews.review_text: I like these they're very comfortable and they allow a lot of venting of air circulation. No back side pockets tho. Otherwise an excellent choice for the next design also.

reviews.title: Look good with lots of pockets!
reviews.review_text: These Reebok Unwind Cargo Sweats are really nice! They have deep side pockets with the cargo pockets in front! The legs are a slim fit toward the bottom, which looks nice. Bought my Husband the last 2 pair they had at our local Walmart, in Black and the Light Gray! He like them so much that I ordered 4 more pairs online. It's a good price for Reebok! The fit on him was great! The material is 55% Cotton, 40% polyester, and 5% Spandex, which makes them a nice weight for winter. I have washed them in Warm and lightly dried them. They have held up nicely! Glad I found these for the price, was worth it.

reviews.title: comfy, thick, stretchy
reviews.review_text: my husband is handicapped so has trouble wearing pants. these look a little dressy so ill keep them aside for special occassions till i can purchased more.
right size just Way too Baggy......... Order Smaller size than needed unless you want REALLY BaggyJeans!!!!!!!

reviews.title: So nice!
reviews.review_text: I love these pants. They're so comfortable I can sleep in them, go out in them, and workout in them. I like them so much I ordered 2 more pairs in different colors.

reviews.title: Awesome Pants
reviews.review_text: these pants are amazing. I purchased due to being so tall as a woman and a men's fit way better with length and I'm very happy with the deal I was able to get these at. Well worth the buy!

reviews.title: Good fit and current styling
reviews.review_text: Good fit - what worked for me was to pay attention to the waist size in the size/fit guide provided. Stylish - currently what teenage boys are wearing. Comfortable and made of durable material.
I had a stroke and can't use my right hand so jeans are out. Love the thickness, feel and comfort. Also don't feel like I'm wearing "sweats" out in public. So glad I found them!

reviews.title: comfortable
reviews.review_text: I can wear these most places I go. They are made well and not just average sweatpants. I like all the pockets. i have a navy pair and a black pair. I am 240 and get a large. i wear below waist.

reviews.title: Mo pockets. Mo better
reviews.review_text: Deep pockets. Wider elastic waist is strong enough to hold-up extra weight of cargo pockets. Tapered, no elastic on lower hem. Material has a smoother/heavier feel than a fleece. I am 6 feet tall/230 pounds/ XL
The cargo pants were of good quality and the ease of ordering and delivery was easy and on time.

reviews.title: Please restock!
reviews.review_text: Loved so much wanted to buy more but were sold out.

reviews.title: winter and summer pants
reviews.review_text: they are grate pants do not miss a great pair of pants they look good and fit good
They run a bit big but my bf loves them they aren't to thick or thing a lil stretchy definitely recommend

reviews.title: comfortable
reviews.review_text: They look good after much wear and many washings. I have 2 pair of these. I also have 2 other Adidas made a little different.

reviews.title: Sweats to dress up or down!
reviews.review_text: Great looking sweats! Looks like cargo pants. Very comfortable and washes up great with no wrinkles.

reviews.title: Comfort To The MAX!
reviews.review_text: They are so comfortable I forget that I have them on.

reviews.title: Quality product !
reviews.review_text: Comfortable and durable enough for gym use.

reviews.title: Awesome sweatpants
reviews.review_text: Reebok makes the best sweatpants

reviews.title: versatile and comfy
reviews.review_text: solid brand and quality is always true to it's name soft and warm with a loose fit versatility to be worn around the house or out and about
my family really likes these, and it's hard to find clothing that my youngest son likes and will wear

reviews.title: Great tapered and stylish joggers
reviews.review_text: The Reebok material was nice and soft. The color was a tad lighter than he would of liked but the grey is nice for Spring time. Husband particularly the pockets on the pants and how they could hold his wallet with a Velcro square. He ordered an XL and they are a bit big, he typically wears a large and will exchange for that.
Grandsonloves these, the fit and comfort make them a favorite.

reviews.title: Good casual pants
reviews.review_text: Nice color fit is good length is not too long for my legs.
i dont like the skinney leg style but they are still great

reviews.title: Great to wear.
reviews.review_text: I'm 5'10" 170 lbs. and they fit me perfectly. Super comfortable and soft.

reviews.title: Good price and great value
reviews.review_text: My husband loves them. Very comfortable and great fit.

reviews.title: Quality %26 Price
reviews.review_text: Great fit (size L) %26 cargo pocket wonderful for phone. Bought a second pair bc liked everything.

reviews.title: Sweatpants
reviews.review_text: Looks great on. Feels great. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Good fit and stylish
reviews.review_text: Comfortable, durable, fit is good, style is in right now.

reviews.title: Great buy.
reviews.review_text: Very comfortable. Price is great. Fit me perfectly..

reviews.title: Sweatpants for everyday use
reviews.review_text: These pants are a large they fit true to size. I like all the pockets that these sweatpants have The Gray that I have almost goes with anything. These pants are good for just about anything around the house and they are very comfortable These could easily be used everyday with no problem or style clash. I write these 7 out of 10.

reviews.title: Cargo pants true to size and versatile
reviews.review_text: I recently got my boyfriend these cargo joggers and he has very much liked them. They are a go to for comfortability and versatility. Pants are very soft and cozy. They also offer a sleek fit that allows the pants to be worn for loungwear, casual day to say wear, or traveling. The attention to detail from the quality of the fabric to the functional of the pockets also add to the appeal.

reviews.title: Thick material and a little baggy
reviews.review_text: My husband normally wears a size medium and these were a size medium. They seem to fit ok, but a little baggy. They are super thick material. The cargo pockets are Velcro which I don't love. The logo is reflective which is good for walking the dog at night. Not the most flattering pants for him.

reviews.title: Reebok unwind cargo pant for men
reviews.review_text: These Reebok cargo pants are a jogger like fit. They are a size xl and run large, I would recommend sizing down when you order these. These could be dressed up or down for a comfy day. These would be great for a Jog outside as well. The material is thick but not super hot. Great value for the price and quality.

reviews.title: Comfortable, soft pants for the win
reviews.review_text: These pants fit good and as expected. I love wearing mens clothes because they can be so Comfy. The length was great on these and the fit. Very soft inside too which was a plus. I'm 5'6 and weigh 160 and I'm for sure keeping these. I love the extra pockets on the side too. For the price, style and comfort these are amazing!

reviews.title: Comfortable and loose fitting cargo pants
reviews.review_text: My husband is 5 foot 10 and weighs about 170lbs. He is wearing a size large here and said that they fit right on point. They are loose fitting and comfortable. He didn't like how large the waist band was and he had to tie them very tight to keep them up. He did think they were comfortable and he could wear them around the house or even to run a quick errand.

reviews.title: Great cargo sweatpants for loungewear
reviews.review_text: I bought these cargo sweatpants as a gift for my dad. He's a 34 waist, 6 feet tall, and usually wears a Medium. The medium in these pants fit great. He was really impressed with the quality of the material and the variety of pockets. They are very comfy, and he put them on to wear for the day right away. A great gift for the guys in your life.

reviews.title: Reebok mens cargo gray pants
reviews.review_text: I really like these gray cargo sweatpants. I would say they are true to size. I am wearing a size large. These will be great for layering when I'm going to and from the gym this upcoming fall and winter seasons, as they are very warm. I also like that they have pockets on both sides. Not only convenient, but it gives the pants a little decor.

reviews.title: Great jogger style pants.
reviews.review_text: The material and fit of these pants are very nice. Also a great light grey color. The one thing we did not like was that there are no bands around the ankle like a jogger they just kind of taper off. Not a total deal breaker but I do wish they were more like a jogger. We ordered his normal size medium and they fit very well.

reviews.title: Reebok Winter Cargo Pants for Men
reviews.review_text: My husband is wearing Reebok Men's Unwind Cargo Pants, clothing size M, color Sleet This cargo pants is bulky and big , does not look flattering on my husband. The elastic drawcord is clumsy looking. The cargo pockets has a tiny piece of Velcro to keep shut, not very secure as a cargo pants . It will keep you warm though!

reviews.title: Reebok Mens Unwind Cargo Pants
reviews.review_text: I purchased these Reebok Unwind, Cargo Pants in size large. These cargo pants run true to size. Even though these are called a cargo pant, I would classify them as a cross between a cargo pant and a jogger pant. They have cargo pant pockets, but they also have a drawstring waist comfortable jogger type material and are great for exercising.

reviews.title: Great fit, with pockets!
reviews.review_text: Hubby loves these so much they're his XMAS wish. He goes to the gym almost daily and He loves that there are 2 pockets types on each leg, zippered and folded, along with the soft warmth of the material. They washed well, dried on low without shrinkage. We purchased Medium in the store and ordered online. Received Large incorrectly but he's keeping them. Medium best fits his 6ft, 190lb body in a neat manner, not bulky or sloppy. My hubby doesn't ever do sloppy. Hoping these return to stock soon.

reviews.title: Comfortable pants for lounging
reviews.review_text: My hubby is a size 34 waist and 32 length. These size large were a little long for his liking. He likes the comfort. The pants are comfortable for him and waistband comfortable. The material is thick and good for an outdoor activity. I'm not a fan of the styling but it didn't seen to bother him.

reviews.title: Grey Reebok Cargo Sweats.
reviews.review_text: I love the concept for these sweats. The extra pockets will definitely come in handy. They fit baggy for a Large but that's really what I was looking for. I like the loose fit because it gives a more relaxing sense of comfort. These sweatpants are perfect for a Lazy Sunday or maybe even a light workout. 5 out of 5. I am 5'10 and am wearing a size Large.

reviews.title: Size medium fit true to size.
reviews.review_text: These are a medium and fit true to size. They are really nicer than we expected. The length is perfect and the actual fit is really good. He was impressed with the pockets. The color is so nice and neutral so it will pair nicely with anything. These are a winner and we may have to get more colors.

reviews.title: Reeboks Mens Unwind Cargo Pants
reviews.review_text: My husband felt the size large cargo pants were a bit too formal. They felt loose around the crotch, leg, and buttocks area. The material is very soft, stretchy, and comfortable, but way too baggy. The side pocket is nice and handy to hold your wallet or your keys. My husband really liked the color and it will match with many different color tees.
Listed for $29 but item tags marked $28.00. Why is that?
I like the product just fine, but I bought a similar product last year and the price for this item increased almost 30% in just a short period of time.

Now that I've washed them, I haven't seen any signs of pilling. They are comfortable and still look brand new after a wash. I normally don't like my ankles restricted but, that hasn't given me any problems so far.
They are good pants. Unfortunately I realized I ordered them too large after I washed them. No problem. They're still very comfy.

reviews.title: Perfect for my tall teen
reviews.review_text: These joggers look great, not slept in, and fit my 6'3 kiddo. He approves so it's a win! Bought all colors available

reviews.title: Great product that meets multiple size needs.
reviews.review_text: These are very comfortable pants that don't lose shape. No overheating or lack cooling. I want more colors!

reviews.title: Good looking pants.
reviews.review_text: He likes them. Spouse is 6 feet 190 lbs. and a large fit. The leg strips make these really look sharp.
the cat did not work for me and looked extremely baggy and sloppy. material is nice but this wasn't what I was looking for.

reviews.title: well made
reviews.review_text: very soft and warm but heavier than a normal sweat pant. draw string and thick waist with elastic. great for cold weather!

reviews.title: The best and softest
reviews.review_text: these are so great. i bought 6 pairs for my husband to replace his other type ones. Ordering more soon to keep on hand.

reviews.title: Love the pants I just did not want navy blue
reviews.review_text: Love the pants style , just wanted all black
I love the sweatpants. The fit great and feel great

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: I love these they are so confrontable and the price is very good
Material was soft I've bought 2 pairs so far for my husband.

reviews.title: run big, had to return
reviews.review_text: sizing runs big. if u are a 3x you will need a 2x

reviews.title: Great feel
reviews.review_text: Great feel and fit extremely comfortable

reviews.title: Great fit, comfortable
reviews.review_text: Loved the way they fit and look neat- not sloppy. Wash snd hang-up to dry - zero shrinkage.

reviews.title: Satisfied spouse
reviews.review_text: He likes them. Spouse is 6 feet 190 lbs. and a 34 fit.

reviews.title: Good quality
reviews.review_text: Like the good quality material used , stretchy and comfortable
i misjudged the size but as soon as i put them on this material just felt so good against my skin! comfyiest pair of sweat pants i've ever bought.
